questions.question: Which transformer would you use if you had to read data from a local file but you want to read only features that intersect another stream of polygon features?
Which transformer would you use to securely send sensitive data of any size between applications in the Amazon Web Services ecosystem?
When working with web services, what is the major advantage of using a Connector transformer over using the HTTPCaller to make an API call directly?
options: Connector transformers are available for all APIs.
The HTTPCaller will always be slower than the Connector transformer.
The relevant parameters are already exposed to you, making it faster and easier to interact with the API.

questions.question: You just made an API call, and the object returned was a binary file, now stored in the _response_body attribute. Which transformer can you use to save the file locally?
